title: tokyohd
author: tokyohd
content: Ethereum classic (ETC) is six years old this month and it’s seen some significant gains during the last 14 days. In fact, ever since the penciled-in date for The Merge was revealed, ETC has risen in value alongside its counterpart ethereum (ETH).While ETH has seen a significant double-digit ​​45.7% gain in two weeks, ETC has jumped 124.2% in that same period of time. Despite the 124% rise, year-to-date, ETC is still down 34% and around 80% lower than the crypto asset’s all-time high at $167 per unit. Full Details: https://news.bitcoin.com/ethereum-classic-climbs-124-in-2-weeks-hashrate-spikes-krw-captures-20-of-etcs-trade-volume/

comments.author: asriloni
comments.body: No doubt if that was happening with ETC. FOMO is real after merged announcement combined with the news that came from antpool. So many people are starting to put their money on ETC. it seems like that antpool has no chance to mine ethereum anymore in the future. So many miners are starting to move to the ETC. i guess this is the impact caused by ethereum merged announcement and so more miners migrate to the ETC.

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: Yes, it looks like ETC is getting a breath of fresh air right now as it could rise to a price of $33 (if I'm not mistaken). If the situation continues like this and ETC finds more support, there is a possibility that the price could continue to rise higher. But I'm not sure if the price can go beyond $100 because that's still a long way to go. Maybe if there is an altcoin season in the next month, it could trigger the price to go higher but if not, maybe the price will reach $50-$75 first. Maybe we can analyze and find more information about this to know what we should do.

Ethereum classic will dominate the altcoin market for some time before any major pullback will happen.

comments.body: Ethereum Classic is like a walking dead that follows Ethereum in news and rise tides. When Ethereum has big news and increases a log, Ethereum Classic will follow it. It is more obvious when Ethereum is moving so close to its switch from Proof of Work to Proof of Stake. The stop of Proof of Work for mining on Ethereum network will force miners to switch their rigs to Ethereum Classic.People believe that when more miners come, the network of Ethereum Classic will become bigger and stronger. comments.author: Fundamentals Of
comments.body: It was indeed a surprising move for Ethereum Classic. Nobody probably expected that very quick rise. Although there is so much excitement building up around Ethereum for the upcoming merge, it wasn't something that is about Ethereum Classic. But it seems it also has a strong effect on it. I'm not sure if it is indeed the reason behind the rally because the rise of Ethereum itself is much lower than Ethereum Classic's. But it seems it has something to do with it.

Indeed there was an effect on the Classic itself, we never thought that it can still do good in the bear market (although still very far from the last all time high).So we will see where it goes, as someone said, congrats to those who hold ETC, I'm not a holder but it seems they have defied the test of time and still in the market, just a shadow of its big brother. Nevertheless, it goes with the market sentiments and didn't die down in the last 2 bearish markets.

comments.author: fuguebtc
comments.body: Once the merge of ETH is completed, ETC is bound to have a good future. all miners will not have many options after upgrading ETH, one is to stop mining, the other is to switch to ETC mining. Of course ETC mining is the better option and this will make ETC more attractive. Everything still depends on ETH, after moving to POS, ETH does not keep its form and becomes more centralized, I myself will consider switching to ETC if it meets the criteria of decentralization.
